subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ loss to the White Sox increased the likelihood that they would play in a wild-card game. Earlier, Masahiro Tanaka threw off a mound but said he still felt a hamstring strain.
snippet: The Yankees’ loss to the White Sox increased the likelihood that they would play in a wild-card game. Earlier, Masahiro Tanaka threw off a mound but said he still felt a hamstring strain.
